full_summary:
### Request for Proposal M7594-233692B for Handheld High Pressure Mass Spectrometry Detection System
#### Solicitation Number: WS4328596170
#### Notice Number: WS4328596170-Doc4381339129

**Procurement Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of four (4) Handheld High Pressure Mass Spectrometry (HPMS) systems for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). The HPMS systems are required for the detection of vapour, aerosols, liquids and solids from trace to bulk values for narcotics, explosives and Chemical Warfare Agents (CWA).

**Key Dates:**

* **Proposal Submittal Date:** January 19, 2024, 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 28, 2024

**Specifications and Evaluation Criteria:**
The RFP requires bidders to submit proposals that meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The delivery shall be completed within the given timeframe on or before March 31st, 2024.

**Evaluation Methodology:**
Variations or combinations of the above methods will be used to evaluate the proposals.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Contact Information:**

* Amber Trotechaud (SPAC/PSPC)
* Phone: None
* Email: [amber.trotechaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:amber.trotechaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18427297?extsite=MTg0MjcyOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Note:** All bids submitted after the specified deadline will be declared non-responsive, and the RCMP will not be responsible for delays or loss of data resulting from late submissions. Contestants are advised to carefully review the RFP documentation before submitting their proposals.
